dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Hey B, uh, got something pretty exciting on my radar today, you know, for our tech-savvy listeners, especially those interested in, like, the future of things.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Hey B, uh, got something pretty exciting on my radar today, you know, for our tech-savvy listeners, especially those interested in, like, the future of things.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Oh yeah? What's, uh, what's got you buzzing, Host_A? Agriculture tech, maybe? I know that's your jam.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Oh yeah? What's, uh, what's got you buzzing, Host_A? Agriculture tech, maybe? I know that's your jam.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: You know me too well! We're talking about 'Reconnect' – this really, um, high-tech exhibition. It's actually the second one of its kind to be held inland.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: You know me too well! We're talking about Reconnect - this really, um, high-tech exhibition. It's actually the second one of its kind to be held inland.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Reconnect is the first high-tech exhibition to be held right next to the beach - with the signature of Z Empire in Athens.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Right, right! The second inland one, with Y Empire behind it, I think? I saw something about that.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Right, right! The second inland one, with Y Empire behind it, I think? I saw something about that.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Reconnect is the first high-tech exhibition to be held right next to the beach - with the signature of Z Empire in Athens.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Exactly! And it's happening from September 20th to 23rd, over at the Makedonia Palace in Thessaloniki.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Exactly! And it's happening from September twentieth to twenty third, over at the Makedonia Palace in Thessaloniki.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: It will take place from September 28 to October 1 at Grand Resort Lagonissi.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Okay, so a prime location. And, uh, it's bringing together *all* the key players, right? From the agriculture industry, both from Greece and, like, abroad?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Okay, so a prime location. And, uh, it's bringing together all the key players, right? From the agriculture industry, both from Greece and, like, abroad?
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: All the key players of the electronics industry from all around Greece and abroad will be present.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, totally! Decision-makers, farmers, retailers, tech experts – it's, uh, pretty much *the* event that's never happened before in Greece.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, totally! Decision-makers, farmers, retailers, tech experts - it's, uh, pretty much the event that's never happened before in Greece.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Decision-makers, manufacturers, retailers, and technology experts will join forces in one event that has never happened before in Greece.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Wow, never before? That's a big claim! So, what's actually, you know, going on there? Besides just, like, booths?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Wow, never before? That's a big claim! So, what's actually, you know, going on there? Besides just, like, booths?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Oh, so much more! They've got a CEO Lounge for networking, a whole series of live sessions, even this '60 to impress' where companies can, um, pitch their portfolio.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Oh, so much more! They've got a C E O Lounge for networking, a whole series of live sessions, even this sixty to impress where companies can, um, pitch their portfolio.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: the participants will have the opportunity to use the CEO Lounge and network through a series of live sessions and activities - such as 90' to impress where each company will present its portfolio and services.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Sixty minutes to impress? That's intense! And I heard the booths are, like, really state-of-the-art and tailored to each participant's needs?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Sixty minutes to impress? That's intense! And I heard the booths are, like, really state-of-the-art and tailored to each participant's needs?
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: All these will take place during the exhibition in the specially designed and state-of-the-art booths that are tailor-made to the needs of each participant.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, super custom. But, um, get this – the whole experience doesn't even stop when the exhibition closes!
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, super custom. But, um, get this - the whole experience doesn't even stop when the exhibition closes!

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Exactly! Two consecutive nights of special themed parties, gala dinners, music concerts... all at an old warehouse near the Aegean Sea.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Exactly! Two consecutive nights of special themed parties, gala dinners, music concerts... all at an old warehouse near the Aegean Sea.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: After the exhibition, for three consecutive nights, special themed parties, gala dinners, and fashion shows will take place at Achillion Ribas, a magnificent venue overlooking the Saronic Gulf.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Whoa, that sounds amazing! So, it's business *and* a vacation, basically? With, like, chefs from all over?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Whoa, that sounds amazing! So, it's business and a vacation, basically? With, like, chefs from all over?
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Greek and non-Greek designers, a different one every night, will present their creations and carry us away to a unique experience that combines business and pleasure.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Pretty much! Greek and non-Greek chefs, a different one every night. It's, uh, really combining serious business with serious entertainment.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Pretty much! Greek and non-Greek chefs, a different one every night. It's, uh, really combining serious business with serious entertainment.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Greek and non-Greek designers, a different one every night, will present their creations and carry us away to a unique experience that combines business and pleasure.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: So, Y Empire is really pulling out all the stops for Reconnect. Sounds like a can't-miss event for anyone involved in agriculture.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: So, Y Empire is really pulling out all the stops for Reconnect. Sounds like a can't-miss event for anyone involved in agriculture.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Reconnect, hosted by Z Empire, offers a new experience to both exhibitors and visitors. It is a truly unique event that no one should miss.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Definitely! And with all those, um, big-name sponsors backing it, you know it's gonna be top-tier.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Definitely! And with all those, um, big-name sponsors backing it, you know it's gonna be top-tier.
